Reveal the top five cards of your library. You may put a creature card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.
Spell mastery — If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, put up to two creature cards from among the revealed cards into your hand instead of one.

name: The Great Aurora
text: Each player shuffles all cards from their hand and all permanents they own into their library, then draws that many cards. Each player may put any number of land cards from their hand onto the battlefield. Exile The Great Aurora.

name: Joraga Invocation
text: Each creature you control gets +3/+3 until end of turn and must be blocked this turn if able.

name: Wild Instincts
text: Target creature you control gets +2/+2 until end of turn. It fights target creature an opponent controls. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

name: Bargain
text:
Target opponent draws a card.
You gain 7 life.

name: Festival of Trokin
text: You gain 2 life for each creature you control.

name: Déjà Vu
text: Return target sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Eye Spy
text: Look at the top card of target player's library. You may put that card into their graveyard.

name: Piracy
text: Until end of turn, you may tap lands you don't control for mana. Spend this mana only to cast spells.

name: Touch of Brilliance
text: Draw two cards.

name: Undo
text: Return two target creatures to their owners' hands.

name: Wind Sail
text: One or two target creatures gain flying until end of turn.

name: Bloodcurdling Scream
text: Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn.

name: Chorus of Woe
text: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

name: Dark Offering
text: Destroy target nonblack creature. You gain 3 life.

name: Hand of Death
text: Destroy target nonblack creature.

name: Kiss of Death
text: Kiss of Death deals 4 damage to target opponent or planeswalker. You gain 4 life.

name: Return of the Nightstalkers
text: Return all Nightstalker permanent cards from your graveyard to the battlefield. Then destroy all Swamps you control.

name: Goblin War Cry
text: Target opponent chooses a creature they control. Other creatures they control can't block this turn.

name: Goblin War Strike
text: Goblin War Strike deals damage to target player or planeswalker equal to the number of Goblins you control.

name: Jagged Lightning
text: Jagged Lightning deals 3 damage to each of two target creatures.

name: Harmony of Nature
text: Tap any number of untapped creatures you control. You gain 4 life for each creature tapped this way.

name: Renewing Touch
text: Shuffle any number of target creature cards from your graveyard into your library.

name: Salvage
text: Put target card from your graveyard on top of your library.

name: Granny's Payback
text: You gain life equal to your age.

name: Call from the Grave
text: Put a random creature from a random graveyard into play under your control. Call from the Grave deals to you an amount of damage equal to that creature's casting cost.

name: Whimsy
text: Play X random fast effects.

name: Three Dreams
text: Search your library for up to three Aura cards with different names, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.

name: See Beyond
text: Draw two cards, then shuffle a card from your hand into your library.

name: Proposal
text: Allows Richard to propose marriage to Lily. If the proposal is accepted both players win; mix the cards in play, both libraries, and both graveyards as a shared deck.

name: Splendid Genesis
text: Shuffle all cards in the game together and deal them into three decks. The game continues with a new player.

name: Fraternal Exaltation
text: Sneak into your parents' closet to get a deck. Your new brother is joining the game.

name: Phoenix Heart
text: Koni and Richard continue the game and play all games as partners forever.

name: Blessed Wind
text: Target player's life total becomes 20.

name: Denying Wind
text: Search target player's library for up to seven cards and exile them. Then that player shuffles.

name: Mana Vapors
text: Lands target player controls don't untap during their next untap step.

name: Psychic Theft
text: Target player reveals their hand. You choose an instant or sorcery card from it and exile that card. You may cast that card for as long as it remains exiled. At the beginning of the next end step, if you haven't cast the card, return it to its owner's hand.

name: Rhystic Scrying
text: Draw three cards. Then if any player pays {2}, discard three cards.

name: Despoil
text: Destroy target land. Its controller loses 2 life.

name: Flay
text: Target player discards a card at random. Then that player discards another card at random unless they pay {1}.

name: Outbreak
text:
You may discard a Swamp card rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Choose a creature type. All creatures of that type get -1/-1 until end of turn.

name: Rhystic Syphon
text: Unless target player pays {3}, that player loses 5 life and you gain 5 life.

name: Rhystic Tutor
text: Unless any player pays {2}, search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle.

name: Soul Strings
text: Return two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand unless any player pays {X}.

name: Devastate
text: Destroy target land. Devastate deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.

name: Search for Survivors
text: Reorder your graveyard at random. An opponent chooses a card at random in your graveyard. If it's a creature card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, exile it.

name: Calming Verse
text: Destroy all enchantments you don't control. Then if you control an untapped land, destroy all enchantments you control.

name: Elephant Resurgence
text: Each player creates a green Elephant creature token. Those creatures have "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creature cards in its controller's graveyard."

name: Wing Storm
text: Wing Storm deals damage to each player equal to twice the number of creatures with flying that player controls.

name: Sickening Dreams
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard X cards.
Sickening Dreams deals X damage to each creature and each player.

name: Crippling Fatigue
text:
Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
Flashback—{1}{B}, Pay 3 life. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

name: Feast of Blood
text:
Cast this spell only if you control two or more Vampires.
Destroy target creature. You gain 4 life.

name: Heroes Remembered
text:
You gain 20 life.
Suspend 10—{W} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {W} and exile it with ten time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

name: Retether
text: Return each Aura card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Only creatures can be enchanted this way. (Aura cards that can't enchant a creature on the battlefield remain in your graveyard.)

name: Dichotomancy
text:
For each tapped nonland permanent target opponent controls, search that player's library for a card with the same name as that permanent. Put those cards onto the battlefield under your control, then that player shuffles.
Suspend 3—{1}{U}{U} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {1}{U}{U} and exile it with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

name: Wistful Thinking
text: Target player draws two cards, then discards four cards.

name: Temporal Extortion
text:
When you cast this spell, any player may pay half their life, rounded up. If a player does, counter Temporal Extortion.
Take an extra turn after this one.

name: Boom // Bust
text: Destroy target land you control and target land you don't control.

name: Eternal Dominion
text:
Search target opponent's library for an artifact, creature, enchantment, or land card. Put that card onto the battlefield under your control. Then that player shuffles.
Epic (For the rest of the game, you can't cast spells. At the beginning of each of your upkeeps, copy this spell except for its epic ability. You may choose a new target for the copy.)

name: Cruel Tutor
text: Search your library for a card, then shuffle and put that card on top. You lose 2 life.

name: Extinction
text: Destroy all creatures of the creature type of your choice.

name: Decree of Annihilation
text:
Exile all artifacts, creatures, and lands from the battlefield, all cards from all graveyards, and all cards from all hands.
Cycling {5}{R}{R} ({5}{R}{R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Decree of Annihilation, destroy all lands.

name: Parallel Evolution
text:
For each creature token on the battlefield, its controller creates a token that's a copy of that creature.
Flashback {4}{G}{G}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

name: Vampiric Feast
text: Vampiric Feast deals 4 damage to any target and you gain 4 life.

name: Repay in Kind
text: Each player's life total becomes the lowest life total among all players.

name: Dragon's Approach
text:
Dragon's Approach deals 3 damage to each opponent. You may exile Dragon's Approach and four cards named Dragon's Approach from your graveyard. If you do, search your library for a Dragon creature card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
A deck can have any number of cards named Dragon's Approach.

name: Invade the City
text: Amass X, where X is the number of instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard. (Put X +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

name: Wake of Destruction
text: Destroy target land and all other lands with the same name as that land.

name: March of Souls
text: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated. For each creature destroyed this way, its controller creates a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

name: Planar Overlay
text: Each player chooses a land they control of each basic land type. Return those lands to their owners' hands.

name: Bog Down
text:
Kicker—Sacrifice two lands. (You may sacrifice two lands in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell.)
Target player discards two cards. If this spell was kicked, that player discards three cards instead.

name: Exotic Disease
text: Domain — Target player loses X life and you gain X life, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control.

name: Noxious Vapors
text: Each player reveals their hand, chooses one card of each color from it, then discards all other nonland cards.

name: Implode
text:
Destroy target land.
Draw a card.

name: Strafe
text: Strafe deals 3 damage to target nonred creature.

name: Urza's Guilt
text: Each player draws two cards, then discards three cards, then loses 4 life.

name: Scent of Cinder
text: Reveal any number of red cards in your hand. Scent of Cinder deals X damage to any target, where X is the number of cards revealed this way.

name: False Peace
text: Target player skips all combat phases of their next turn.

name: Renewing Dawn
text: You gain 2 life for each Mountain target opponent controls.

name: Steadfastness
text: Creatures you control get +0/+3 until end of turn.

name: Temporary Truce
text: Each player may draw up to two cards. For each card less than two a player draws this way, that player gains 2 life.

name: Valorous Charge
text: White creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn.

name: Warrior's Charge
text: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

name: Cloak of Feathers
text:
Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
Draw a card.

name: Cruel Fate
text: Look at the top five cards of target opponent's library. Put one of those cards into that player's graveyard and the rest on top of their library in any order.

name: Flux
text:
Each player discards any number of cards, then draws that many cards.
Draw a card.

name: Omen
text:
Look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order. You may shuffle.
Draw a card.

name: Sorcerous Sight
text:
Look at target opponent's hand.
Draw a card.

name: Taunt
text: During target player's next turn, creatures that player controls attack you if able.

name: Cruel Bargain
text: Draw four cards. You lose half your life, rounded up.

name: Dread Charge
text: Black creatures you control can't be blocked this turn except by black creatures.

name: Final Strike
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Final Strike deals damage to target opponent or planeswalker equal to the sacrificed creature's power.

name: Howling Fury
text: Target creature gets +4/+0 until end of turn.

name: Mind Knives
text: Target opponent discards a card at random.

name: Nature's Ruin
text: Destroy all green creatures.

name: Vampiric Touch
text: Vampiric Touch deals 2 damage to target opponent or planeswalker and you gain 2 life.

name: Virtue's Ruin
text: Destroy all white creatures.

name: Burning Cloak
text: Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn. Burning Cloak deals 2 damage to that creature.

name: Rain of Salt
text: Destroy two target lands.

name: Scorching Spear
text: Scorching Spear deals 1 damage to any target.

name: Fruition
text: You gain 1 life for each Forest on the battlefield.

name: Mobilize
text: Untap all creatures you control.

name: Nature's Cloak
text: Green creatures you control gain forestwalk until end of turn. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)

name: Winter's Grasp
text: Destroy target land.

name: Sphinx's Decree
text: Each opponent can't cast instant or sorcery spells during that player's next turn.

name: Mastermind's Acquisition
text:
Choose one —
• Search your library for a card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
• Put a card you own from outside the game into your hand.

name: Memoricide
text: Choose a nonland card name. Search target player's graveyard, hand, and library for any number of cards with that name and exile them. Then that player shuffles.

name: Time Spiral
text: Exile Time Spiral. Each player shuffles their hand and graveyard into their library, then draws seven cards. You untap up to six lands.

name: Shatter the Sky
text: Each player who controls a creature with power 4 or greater draws a card. Then destroy all creatures.

name: Purphoros's Intervention
text:
Choose one —
• Create an X/1 red Elemental creature token with trample and haste. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.
• Purphoros's Intervention deals twice X damage to target creature or planeswalker.

name: Nylea's Intervention
text:
Choose one —
• Search your library for up to X land cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.
• Nylea's Intervention deals twice X damage to each creature with flying.

name: Storm's Wrath
text: Storm's Wrath deals 4 damage to each creature and each planeswalker.

name: Allure of the Unknown
text: Reveal the top six cards of your library. An opponent exiles a nonland card from among them, then you put the rest into your hand. That opponent may cast the exiled card without paying its mana cost.

name: Coveted Prize
text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature in your party. (Your party consists of up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)
Search your library for a card, put it into your hand, then shuffle. If you have a full party, you may cast a spell with mana value 4 or less from your hand without paying its mana cost.

name: Nahiri's Lithoforming
text: Sacrifice X lands. For each land sacrificed this way, draw a card. You may play X additional lands this turn. Lands you control enter the battlefield tapped this turn.

name: Maddening Cacophony
text:
Kicker {3}{U}
Each opponent mills eight cards. If this spell was kicked, instead each opponent mills half their library, rounded up.

name: Inscription of Ruin
text:
Kicker {2}{B}{B}
Choose one. If this spell was kicked, choose any number instead.
• Target opponent discards two cards.
• Return target creature card with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
• Destroy target creature with mana value 3 or less.

name: Shadows' Verdict
text: Exile all creatures and planeswalkers with mana value 3 or less from the battlefield and all creature and planeswalker cards with mana value 3 or less from all graveyards.

name: Inscription of Insight
text:
Kicker {2}{U}{U}
Choose one. If this spell was kicked, choose any number instead.
• Return up to two target creatures to their owners' hands.
• Scry 2, then draw two cards.
• Target player creates an X/X blue Illusion creature token, where X is the number of cards in their hand.

name: Emeria's Call // Emeria, Shattered Skyclave
text: Create two 4/4 white Angel Warrior creature tokens with flying. Non-Angel creatures you control gain indestructible until your next turn.

name: Sea Gate Restoration // Sea Gate, Reborn
text: Draw cards equal to the number of cards in your hand plus one. You have no maximum hand size for the rest of the game.

name: Agadeem's Awakening // Agadeem, the Undercrypt
text: Return from your graveyard to the battlefield any number of target creature cards that each have a different mana value X or less.

name: Shatterskull Smashing // Shatterskull, the Hammer Pass
text: Shatterskull Smashing deals X damage divided as you choose among up to two target creatures and/or planeswalkers. If X is 6 or more, Shatterskull Smashing deals twice X damage divided as you choose among them instead.

name: Turntimber Symbiosis // Turntimber, Serpentine Wood
text: Look at the top seven cards of your library. You may put a creature card from among them onto the battlefield. If that card has mana value 3 or less, it enters with three additional +1/+1 counters on it. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

name: Ondu Inversion // Ondu Skyruins
text: Destroy all nonland permanents.

name: Devastating Mastery
text:
You may pay {2}{W}{W} rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
If the {2}{W}{W} cost was paid, an opponent chooses up to two nonland permanents they control and returns them to their owner's hand.
Destroy all nonland permanents.

name: Multiple Choice
text:
If X is 1, scry 1, then draw a card.
If X is 2, you may choose a player. They return a creature they control to its owner's hand.
If X is 3, create a 4/4 blue and red Elemental creature token.
If X is 4 or more, do all of the above.

name: Tempted by the Oriq
text: For each opponent, gain control of up to one target creature or planeswalker that player controls with mana value 3 or less.

name: Ingenious Mastery
text:
You may pay {2}{U} rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
If the {2}{U} cost was paid, you draw three cards, then an opponent creates two Treasure tokens and they scry 2. If that cost wasn't paid, you draw X cards.

name: Fervent Mastery
text:
You may pay {2}{R}{R} rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
If the {2}{R}{R} cost was paid, an opponent discards any number of cards, then draws that many cards.
Search your library for up to three cards, put them into your hand, shuffle, then discard three cards at random.

name: Draconic Intervention
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, exile an instant or sorcery card from your graveyard.
Draconic Intervention deals X damage to each non-Dragon creature, where X is the exiled card's mana value. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.
Exile Draconic Intervention.

name: Crackle with Power
text: Crackle with Power deals five times X damage to each of up to X targets.

name: Exponential Growth
text: Until end of turn, double target creature's power X times.

name: Verdant Mastery
text:
You may pay {3}{G} rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Search your library for up to four basic land cards and reveal them. Put one of them onto the battlefield tapped under an opponent's control if the {3}{G} cost was paid. Put two of them onto the battlefield tapped under your control and the rest into your hand. Then shuffle.

name: Ecological Appreciation
text: Search your library and graveyard for up to four creature cards with different names that each have mana value X or less and reveal them. An opponent chooses two of those cards. Shuffle the chosen cards into your library and put the rest onto the battlefield. Exile Ecological Appreciation.

name: Expressive Iteration
text: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand, put one of them on the bottom of your library, and exile one of them. You may play the exiled card this turn.

name: Rip Apart
text:
Choose one —
• Rip Apart deals 3 damage to target creature or planeswalker.
• Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

name: Silverquill Command
text:
Choose two —
• Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains flying until end of turn.
• Return target creature card with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
• Target player draws a card and loses 1 life.
• Target opponent sacrifices a creature.

name: Witherbloom Command
text:
Choose two —
• Target player mills three cards, then you return a land card from your graveyard to your hand.
• Destroy target noncreature, nonland permanent with mana value 2 or less.
• Target creature gets -3/-1 until end of turn.
• Target opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

name: Culling Ritual
text: Destroy each nonland permanent with mana value 2 or less. Add {B} or {G} for each permanent destroyed this way.

name: Culmination of Studies
text: Exile the top X cards of your library. For each land card exiled this way, create a Treasure token. For each blue card exiled this way, draw a card. For each red card exiled this way, Culmination of Studies deals 1 damage to each opponent.

name: Blot Out the Sky
text: Create X tapped 2/1 white and black Inkling creature tokens with flying. If X is 6 or more, destroy all noncreature, nonland permanents.

name: Body of Research
text: Create a 0/0 green and blue Fractal creature token. Put X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the number of cards in your library.

name: Mass Manipulation
text: Gain control of X target creatures and/or planeswalkers.

name: Awaken the Erstwhile
text: Each player discards all the cards in their hand, then creates that many 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.

name: Wild Swing
text: Choose three target nonenchantment permanents. Destroy one of them at random.

name: Feral Lightning
text: Create three 3/1 red Elemental creature tokens with haste. Exile them at the beginning of the next end step.

name: Ashuza's Breath
text: For each creature, choose a number from 0 to 2 at random. Ashuza's Breath deals that much damage to that creature.

name: Depopulate
text: Each player who controls a multicolored creature draws a card. Then destroy all creatures.

name: Cut Your Losses
text:
Casualty 2 (As you cast this spell, you may sacrifice a creature with power 2 or greater. When you do, copy this spell and you may choose a new target for the copy.)
Target player mills half their library, rounded down.

name: Cut of the Profits
text:
Casualty 3 (As you cast this spell, you may sacrifice a creature with power 3 or greater. When you do, copy this spell.)
You draw X cards and you lose X life.

name: Structural Assault
text: Destroy all artifacts, then Structural Assault deals damage to each creature equal to the number of artifacts that were put into graveyards from the battlefield this turn.

name: Corpse Explosion
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, exile a creature card from your graveyard.
Corpse Explosion deals damage equal to the exiled card's power to each creature and each planeswalker.

name: Hostile Takeover
text: Up to one target creature has base power and toughness 1/1 until end of turn. Up to one other target creature has base power and toughness 4/4 until end of turn. Then Hostile Takeover deals 3 damage to each creature.

name: Incandescent Aria
text: Incandescent Aria deals 3 damage to each nontoken creature.

name: Meeting of the Five
text: Exile the top ten cards of your library. You may cast spells with exactly three colors from among them this turn. Add {W}{W}{U}{U}{B}{B}{R}{R}{G}{G}. Spend this mana only to cast spells with exactly three colors.

name: Startled Awake // Persistent Nightmare
text:
Target opponent mills thirteen cards.
{3}{U}{U}: Put Startled Awake from your graveyard onto the battlefield transformed. Activate only as a sorcery.

name: Welcome to the Fold
text:
Madness {X}{U}{U} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)
Gain control of target creature if its toughness is 2 or less. If this spell's madness cost was paid, instead gain control of that creature if its toughness is X or less.

name: Behold the Beyond
text: Discard your hand. Search your library for three cards, put them into your hand, then shuffle.

name: Burn from Within
text: Burn from Within deals X damage to any target. If a creature is dealt damage this way, it loses indestructible until end of turn. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.

name: Devils' Playground
text: Create four 1/1 red Devil creature tokens. They have "When this creature dies, it deals 1 damage to any target."

name: Seasons Past
text: Return any number of cards with different mana values from your graveyard to your hand. Put Seasons Past on the bottom of its owner's library.

name: Traverse the Ulvenwald
text:
Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
Delirium — If there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, instead search your library for a creature or land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

name: Empty City Ruse
text: Target opponent skips all combat phases of their next turn.

name: Riding Red Hare
text: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains horsemanship until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with horsemanship.)

name: Virtuous Charge
text: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

name: Broken Dam
text: Tap one or two target creatures without horsemanship.

text: Return one or two target creatures to their owners' hands.

name: Sage's Knowledge
text: Return target sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

text: Target opponent discards two cards.

text: Target opponent chooses a creature they control. Destroy that creature.

name: Poison Arrow
text: Destroy target nonblack creature. You gain 3 life.

name: Return to Battle
text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Burning Fields
text: Burning Fields deals 5 damage to target opponent or planeswalker.

name: Control of the Court
text: Draw four cards, then discard three cards at random.

name: Desert Sandstorm
text: Desert Sandstorm deals 1 damage to each creature.

name: Eunuchs' Intrigues
text: Target opponent chooses a creature they control. Other creatures they control can't block this turn.

name: Borrowing the East Wind
text: Borrowing the East Wind deals X damage to each creature with horsemanship and each player.

name: False Mourning
text: Put target card from your graveyard on top of your library.

name: Marshaling the Troops
text: Tap any number of untapped creatures you control. You gain 4 life for each creature tapped this way.

name: Spring of Eternal Peace
text: You gain 8 life.

name: Taunting Challenge
text: All creatures able to block target creature this turn do so.

name: Wielding the Green Dragon
text: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

name: Ass Whuppin'
text: Destroy target silver-bordered permanent in any game you can see from your seat.

name: Finale of Glory
text: Create X 2/2 white Soldier creature tokens with vigilance. If X is 10 or more, also create X 4/4 white Angel creature tokens with flying and vigilance.

name: Ravnica at War
text: Exile all multicolored permanents.

name: Single Combat
text: Each player chooses a creature or planeswalker they control, then sacrifices the rest. Players can't cast creature or planeswalker spells until the end of your next turn.

name: Finale of Revelation
text:
Draw X cards. If X is 10 or more, instead shuffle your graveyard into your library, draw X cards, untap up to five lands, and you have no maximum hand size for the rest of the game.
Exile Finale of Revelation.

name: Command the Dreadhorde
text: Choose any number of target creature and/or planeswalker cards in graveyards. Command the Dreadhorde deals damage to you equal to the total mana value of those cards. Put them onto the battlefield under your control.

name: Deliver Unto Evil
text:
Choose up to four target cards in your graveyard. If you control a Bolas planeswalker, return those cards to your hand. Otherwise, an opponent chooses two of them. Leave the chosen cards in your graveyard and put the rest into your hand.
Exile Deliver Unto Evil.

name: The Elderspell
text: Destroy any number of target planeswalkers. Choose a planeswalker you control. Put two loyalty counters on it for each planeswalker destroyed this way.

name: Finale of Eternity
text: Destroy up to three target creatures with toughness X or less. If X is 10 or more, return all creature cards from your graveyard to the battlefield.

name: Finale of Promise
text: You may cast up to one target instant card and/or up to one target sorcery card from your graveyard each with mana value X or less without paying their mana costs. text: Search your library for a basic land card and reveal it. If there's a tree in its art, put it onto the battlefield tapped. Otherwise, put it into your hand. Then shuffle.

name: Better Than One
text: A person outside the game becomes your teammate. (Choose any number of cards in your hand, on top of your library, or on the battlefield under your control. Those cards become your teammate's hand, library, and permanents, respectively.)

name: Hot Fix
text: You have ten seconds to look at and rearrange the cards in your library. At the end of those ten seconds, if you're touching one or more of those cards, shuffle.

name: Retribution of the Meek
text: Destroy all creatures with power 4 or greater. They can't be regenerated.

name: Forbidden Ritual
text: Sacrifice a nontoken permanent. If you do, target opponent loses 2 life unless that player sacrifices a permanent or discards a card. You may repeat this process any number of times.

text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, return X Swamps you control to their owner's hand.
Infernal Harvest deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures.

name: Song of Blood
text: Mill four cards. Whenever a creature attacks this turn, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each creature card put into your graveyard this way.

name: Storm of Souls
text: Return all creature cards from your graveyard to the battlefield. Each of them is a 1/1 Spirit with flying in addition to its other types. Exile Storm of Souls.

name: Haunting Imitation
text: Each player reveals the top card of their library. For each creature card revealed this way, create a token that's a copy of that card, except it's 1/1, it's a Spirit in addition to its other types, and it has flying. If no creature cards were revealed this way, return Haunting Imitation to its owner's hand.

name: Olivia's Wrath
text: Each non-Vampire creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of Vampires you control.

name: Predators' Hour
text: Until end of turn, creatures you control gain menace and "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, exile the top card of that player's library face down. You may look at and play that card for as long as it remains exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast that spell."

name: Imposing Grandeur
text: Each player may discard their hand and draw cards equal to the greatest mana value of a commander they own on the battlefield or in the command zone.

name: Sinister Waltz

name: Wanderer's Strike
text: Exile target creature, then proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

text:
Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

text: Amass 3. (Put three +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

text: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. You may search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Gideon, the Oathsworn, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle.

text: Return up to two target creatures to their owner's hand. You may search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Jace, Arcane Strategist, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle.

name: Divine Purge
text: Exile all artifacts and creatures with mana value 3 or less. They perpetually gain "This spell costs {2} more to cast" and "This permanent enters the battlefield tapped." For as long as each of them remain exiled, its owner may play it.

name: Unexpected Conversion

name: Ravenous Pursuit
text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control. Choose a creature card in your hand. It perpetually gets +X/+X, where X is the amount of excess damage dealt this way.

name: Begin Anew

name: Undercity Plunder
text: Target opponent discards a card. Then they may discard an additional card. If they don't, conjure a duplicate of a random card from their library into your hand. It perpetually gains "You may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast this spell."

name: Molten Impact
text: Molten Impact deals 4 damage to target creature or planeswalker. If excess damage was dealt this way, when you cast your next instant or sorcery spell, Molten Impact deals damage equal to the excess to target creature or planeswalker.

name: Choice of Fortunes

Seek two cards. You may shuffle them into your library. If you do, seek two cards.

name: Shattering Finale
text:
Casualty 1

Kicker {6} (You may pay an additional {6} as you cast this spell.)

text:

text:
